original_title: Join hands to make Sri Lanka a prosperous nation by 2048: RW
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe called on everyone to join hands with the 25-year plan to make Sri Lanka a prosperous nation by 2048, President's Media Division (PMD) said.

Addressing the 32nd Interact District Conference in Colombo today, he said the country is moving towards stabilization, but the ultimate goal is to create a surplus in the country, like other prosperous countries.
